About Me

BIO

My name is Tonderai Clement Chinya and I am just at the start of what will be a great journey. I am a full-stack Web Application Developer, Designer and Entrepreneur , currently living in Cape Town, South Africa. I have acquired several skills by teaching myself programming through online platforms, and my primary focus and inspiration for my studies is Web Development. I am very passionate about Web Development, and strive to better myself as a developer, and the development community as a whole.

Since 2011, I have been doing general IT consultancy, systems maintenance and network administration. From early 2019, I have fully intergrated web development and it is now my main focus. I am proficient in Python, Javascript, HTML5, CSS5, SASS and bootstrap amongst others, though I primarily use Python for Back-end and Javascript for front-end.
